subject: Arena Football
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Soul will play the San Jose SaberCats, the defending champions, in the Arena Bowl on Sunday in New Orleans. Philadelphia, a fifth-year franchise, is in its first championship game. San Jose is 3-0 in the Arena Bowl, also winning in 2002 and ’04.
